about_the_game:
You wake up in the depths of a mysterious cave. Your task is to find a way to freedom, solving puzzles and fighting for your life. Explore every corner of the cave to find clues and unravel its secrets.

Your path lies through the unexplored trails of the cave, where you will have to solve puzzles, discover hidden passages, and overcome various obstacles. The cave awaits you with challenges that require both mental and physical efforts to overcome all obstacles and find the exit.

Game Features:

  • Horror elements: The game contains elements of horror, creating a tense and frightening atmosphere.
  • Unique puzzles: Puzzles that require solutions as you explore the cave.
  • Unique lore of the universe: The game takes place in a unique universe with a deep and well-thought-out logic.
  • Atmospheric sound accompaniment: The use of sound effects and music to create a tense and frightening atmosphere.
  • Dynamic lighting: The use of light and shadow to create a presence effect and enhance the feeling of fear.

The game is currently in pre-production, and all the features listed above have already been thought out and will be implemented in the final version of the game. Please note that the game is still in development, and the final look of the game may differ from what is shown in the game screenshots on the Steam page. These screenshots are concepts and may not fully reflect the final version of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is in development and will contain elements of unrealistic violence, including confrontations with enemies. The game will also include elements of horror and create a gloomy atmosphere. Please note that the game will not contain realistic violence, sexual content, or any other elements intended for adults only.

name: Cave Dweller

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Q6600 @ 2.40 Ггц (quad-core) / AMD Phenom 9850 (quad-core) @ 2.5 Ггц
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 710 with 2 GB of video memory/ AMD Radeon R7 360 with 2 GB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2 Ггц (quad-core) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4 Ггц (octa - core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 with 2 GB of video memory/ AMD RX 480 with 4 GB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: You wake up in the depths of a cave. Can you unravel all the mysteries of this place and find a way to freedom? This is an adventure where every decision could be the key to success.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
